resources.string: Welcome to CookHelper, your best friend for managing your favorite recipes. CookHelper allows you to create, edit and store recipes and all their important details.
From the navigation drawer, you can access your Recipe Book where it will store your collection of recipes in a list. From here, you\'ll be able to add, edit, delete and view your recipes.
How Do I Add A Recipe?

A floating action button with the + sign in the bottom right-hand corner is available from any menu item chosen from the navigation drawer. 

You'll be able to enter the recipe name, a maximum preparation time, a cultural category, and a meal type. 

To add ingredients, prefix each ingredient name with the hashtag symbol # when writing the steps for your recipe. 

Use an underscore to specify an ingredient, cultural category or meal type that is more than one word. 

eg. Add #milk, #butter and #baking_soda 

To add or remove a step, press the + or - button respectively.
How Do I View A Recipe?
In Recipe Book, tap the recipe from the list of recipes and you\'ll be able to view the recipe and its content.
How Do I Edit A Recipe?

In Recipe Book you can, 

1) Select a recipe and click the Edit button. 

2) Press down on the chosen recipe and a dialog will appear with an option to edit.
How Do I Delete A Recipe?
In Recipe Book, press down on the chosen recipe and a dialog will appear with an option to delete.
How Do I Search For A Recipe?

From the navigation drawer, you can access Advanced Search.

The following search fields are: recipe name, cultural category, meal type, maximum preparation time, and ingredients. Specify at least one or more of these fields and click Search. 

When searching by ingredients, the options to include and exclude ingredients can be achieved by using the special symbols: & (include), - (exclude) and + (optional). 
eg. Tomato &Cheese +bacon -cucumber will search for recipes that contain both tomatoes and cheese, that may contain bacon, but not cucumber.

Any results that match the query will display a list of recipes, otherwise it will indicate that no recipes have been found.
